name: Plush to the Rescue!
description:
Plush to the Rescue!

Run around the claw machine and save plushies from being picked up by the claw. Save plushies by adding them to your line of friends and drop them off in the prize chute to earn points.

Play using a controller or keyboard.

CONTROLS

Controller: left joystick to move, B to collect, A to drop off

Keyboard: WASD or ARROW keys to move, ENTER to collect, SPACEBAR to drop off

CREDITS

Created by Nabeeha Ali, Katie Chen, Natalia Ocampo, Amy Truong

For IMD4006 Advanced Game Design and Development at Carleton University

Fall 2022
